item.title: Getting started with anaconda
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting anaconda set up or installed. Install Anaconda for macOS using command line # Go to the DOWNLOAD ANACONDA NOW page. Beneath the “Graphical Installer” buttons for Anaconda for macOS, there are command-line text links for Python versions 2.7 and 3.6. Download the command line installer for Anaconda with Python 2.7 or Anaconda with Python 3.6. Optional: Verify data integrity with MD5 or SHA-256.
